author: yimuchen
body:
1. Rotated per-module digi-occupancy plot so that col is on x-axis and row is on y-axis
2. Adjusted range for FED info plots


This should go live before the DQM GUI changes made in [PR 468](https://github.com/dmwm/deployment/pull/468)
title: Digi occupancy plot rotated + FED plot range adjustment
